TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Saudi_arabia, title = Saudi_arabia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saudi_arabia} }

S.FORM: Saudi arabia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 25 00 N, 45 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 2,149,690 sq km (maki' tay 13ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,149,690 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 28,160,273. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 80.70% , lhlahuy hya' ga 0.50%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 18.80%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Riyadh. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 23 na tay mqiru' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Salman of Saudi Arabia, aring ryax 23 squ byacing tay 1 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Saodi arabia hya' ga cyox maki' tay 25 00 N, 45 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 2,149,690 sq km (maki' tay 13ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,149,690 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 28,160,273. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 80.70% , lhlahoy hya' ga 0.50%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 18.80%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Riyadh. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 23 na tay mqiro' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Salman of Saodi Arabia, aring ryax 23 sqo byacing tay 1 sa kawas 2015 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
